name: Harvest Doom (sparrow-jam)
description:
This game was made for the Ludum Dare 52 game jam.

The Game:

Harvest DOOM is a team-based multiplayer PvP farming simulator.

Farm and sell crops to score points, steal from your opponents and try not to get shot!

The crops give different score values, so try to find good ones on the map.

WARNING: This game has no single-player mode, so get a friend to play and just join the default server together. (There may be other players there already)

One game lasts 10 minutes.

How to play:

Move by clicking on a tile.

Switch to grab mode with "E", then select a tile to grab or drop an item.

Use items with "SPACE" and select a target or direction.

Use "ESC" or "W" to switch back to move mode.

Reload the shotgun by standing on the ammo box that belongs to your team.

Harvest crops by clicking them. They don't grow without water!

Sell crops by standing in front of the dropbox. Make sure you don't sell it at your opponents farm.
